name: Osprey Farpoint 40 Pack - Men's
description: A lightweight, carry-on-sized travel pack for minimalist globetrotters. Durable fabrics in high-wear areas stand up to being strapped to van-taxi roof racks or tossed into Thai long-tails. The padded hipbelt and harness let you comfortably shoulder the load when your itinerary includes a hut-to-hut trek around Mont Blanc or the Milford Track. If you have to gate-check on the way home, the harness and hipbelt quickly stow away behind a zippered panel. Travel-friendly features include lockable zippers, a padded laptop sleeve, and 2 front compression straps that help you slim it down if you've managed to pare down your gear on the road.Made of lightweight 210-denier ripstop nylon with strong 600-denier packcloth reinforcements and bottom panel.Harness and hipbelt zip behind a panel for protection if you have to check your bag.Foam-padded shoulder straps, back panel and hipbelt have soft mesh contact surfaces.Padded top and side handles provide comfortable carry in suitcase mode. A removable shoulder strap lets you carry it like a briefcase.Large U-shaped zippered opening provides easy access to the main compartment.Interior mesh pockets and compression straps keep your stuff organized.Padded sleeve holds a 15in. laptop.Soft lined pocket protects your sunglasses or electronics.Mesh pockets give you easy access to water bottles.Main compartment and laptop pocket have lockable zippers.External straps let you compress the load.
